episodes.title: The Fall River “Cult” Murders Part 1 | Doreen Levesque, Barbara Raposa, and Karen Marsden
episodes.description: In 1979 and 1980, three young women working in the sex trade in Fall River, Massachusetts were murdered. One person claimed to witness them all, tying two of the murders to a Satanic cult and leading to the convictions of two men. But what happens when she later recants? This case is disputed. Find where to watch the Fall River documentary: https://www.imdb.com/title/tt11717010/ Justice for Carl Drew group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/justiceforcarldrew/ Support the show!
